dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Halt, fool! You dare trespass in the realm of darkness where only despair awaits. What brings you to challenge the might of the Spectralblade?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to bring light to this shadowed land and vanquish the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Naive mortal, your light will only fuel the shadows. Prepare to face your demise at the hands of the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not falter in the face of your threats. Prepare yourself for defeat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery, or foolishness? It matters not. The outcome is already written in the annals of shadow. Brace yourself for the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand resolute, for hope will always triumph over despair!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hope, a fragile concept in these lands. Your defiance ends here, in the cold embrace of eternal darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Even in darkness, a glimmer of hope can pierce through. I will not yield!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool, your hope blinds you to the inevitable. Embrace the darkness that consumes all.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall retreat for now, but know that I will return stronger to challenge you again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Run, little mortal, run while you still can. The darkness will await your return with eager hunger.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am but a wanderer seeking knowledge about the shadows that dwell in this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity begets folly in the realm of shadows. Your quest for knowledge shall be your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Knowledge is the key to understanding, even in the darkest of places.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding is a luxury you cannot afford. Ignorance would have been a kinder fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will tread carefully, for every step unveils new mysteries.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mysteries that will consume you whole, leaving naught but a shadow of your former self. Ignorance was your only salvation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: In the shadows, there lies wisdom waiting to be uncovered. I embrace the challenge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, wisdom in darkness is but a mirage. Prepare to be lost in the labyrinth of shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps the shadows hold secrets that can aid me in my own journey.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Seeking aid from darkness? Pitiful. The shadows will be your downfall, not your salvation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come as a messenger of peace, hoping to find a resolution that benefits us both.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? In this realm of eternal darkness, peace is a delusion. Your words hold no sway here, only the blade.
